legend - Variable in class clueGame.Board

loadBoardConfig() - Method in class clueGame.Board
This loads the data of the board, and throws an exception if the data is not formatted properly or if the file cannot be found.
loadConfigFiles() - Method in class clueGame.Board
Loads the Room, Board, Players, and Weapons configuration files.
loadRoomConfig() - Method in class clueGame.Board
This loads the legend for the different room types.
